ygData.subject: Re: [Digest Number 83]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Dave Gaines  To:  Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 3:10 PM Subject: Re: [[EQ-Monks] Digest Number 83] ...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 3:10 PM
Subject: Re: [[EQ-Monks] Digest Number 83]


> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> >
> > 1 - Monk
> > 2 - Monk / Ranger / Paladin
> > 3 - Enchanter
> > 4 - Druid / Shaman
> > 5 - Cleric
> > 6 - Wizard / Magician
> >
> Change 2 to Monk / Warrior. In a group as diversified
>
> as this, the spells they have are almost useless, and a warrior
> should be able to taunt the monsters better.
>
> Add a bard, replaces 5. In a group of 5 or 6
> a bard is a far better healer than a cleric, and if needed in
> a pinch, the druid/shaman can do the quick healing.

ROFL, you'll never survive in Mistmoore, or lguk without a cleric or 2
shamans/druids. Clerics are ESSENTIAL to groups, because w/o them the two
other priests must save a lot of mana for healing.. This isn't as true at
lower lvls, but it is so very true at upper levels. All groups NEED a
cleric at upper levels..
